article_title: County Pulse: Tax penalties in 2016 are painful for those without health insurance
article_text:
Average household penalty 50 percent increase over 2015

People have until Jan. 31 to enroll and avoid IRS penalty

Covered California director says major risk for uninsured is medical debt

article_metadata.news-keywords: tax penalties, affordable care act, insurance, covered california
article_metadata.description: The tax penalties under the Affordable Care Act are getting steep for the holdouts who still don’t have insurance.
article_metadata.title: County Pulse: Tax penalties in 2016 are painful for those without health insurance | The Modesto Bee
